verses.text: And the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* came unto me, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

\w Son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w man|strong="H0120"\w*, \w prophesy|strong="H5012"\w* against the \w shepherds|strong="H7462"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w prophesy|strong="H5012"\w*, and \w say|strong="H0559"\w* unto them, Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd* unto the \w shepherds|strong="H7462"\w*; \w Woe|strong="H1945"\w* \add be\add* to the \w shepherds|strong="H7462"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* that do \w feed|strong="H7462"\w* themselves! should not the \w shepherds|strong="H7462"\w* \w feed|strong="H7462"\w* the \w flocks|strong="H6629"\w*?

Ye \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* the \w fat|strong="H2459"\w*, and ye \w clothe|strong="H3847"\w* you with the \w wool|strong="H6785"\w*, ye \w kill|strong="H2076"\w* them that are \w fed|strong="H1277"\w*: \add but\add* ye \w feed|strong="H7462"\w* not the \w flock|strong="H6629"\w*.

The \w diseased|strong="H2470"\w* have ye not \w strengthened|strong="H2388"\w*, neither have ye \w healed|strong="H7495"\w* that which was \w sick|strong="H2470"\w*, neither have ye bound \w up|strong="H2280"\w* \add that which was\add* \w broken|strong="H7665"\w*, neither have ye brought \w again|strong="H7725"\w* that which was driven \w away|strong="H5080"\w*, neither have ye \w sought|strong="H1245"\w* that which was \w lost|strong="H0006"\w*; but with \w force|strong="H2394"\w* and with \w cruelty|strong="H6531"\w* have ye \w ruled|strong="H7287"\w* them.

And they were \w scattered|strong="H6327"\w*, because \add there is\add* no \w shepherd|strong="H7462"\w*: and they became \w meat|strong="H0402"\w* to all the \w beasts|strong="H2416"\w* of the \w field|strong="H7704"\w*, when they were \w scattered|strong="H6327"\w*.\f + \fr 34.5 \ft because…: or, without a shepherd\f*

My \w sheep|strong="H6629"\w* \w wandered|strong="H7686"\w* through all the \w mountains|strong="H2022"\w*, and upon every \w high|strong="H7311"\w* \w hill|strong="H1389"\w*: yea, my \w flock|strong="H6629"\w* was \w scattered|strong="H6327"\w* upon all the \w face|strong="H6440"\w* of the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*, and none did \w search|strong="H1875"\w* or \w seek|strong="H1245"\w* \add after them\add*.
¶ Therefore, ye \w shepherds|strong="H7462"\w*, \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*;

\add As\add* I \w live|strong="H2416"\w*, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*, surely because my \w flock|strong="H6629"\w* became a \w prey|strong="H0957"\w*, and my \w flock|strong="H6629"\w* became \w meat|strong="H0402"\w* to every \w beast|strong="H2416"\w* of the \w field|strong="H7704"\w*, because \add there was\add* no \w shepherd|strong="H7462"\w*, neither did my \w shepherds|strong="H7462"\w* \w search|strong="H1875"\w* for my \w flock|strong="H6629"\w*, but the \w shepherds|strong="H7462"\w* \w fed|strong="H7462"\w* themselves, and \w fed|strong="H7462"\w* not my \w flock|strong="H6629"\w*;\f + \fr 34.8 \ft because…: or, without a shepherd\f*
Therefore, O ye \w shepherds|strong="H7462"\w*, \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*;

Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*; Behold, I \add am\add* against the \w shepherds|strong="H7462"\w*; and I will \w require|strong="H1875"\w* my \w flock|strong="H6629"\w* at their \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*, and cause them to \w cease|strong="H7673"\w* from \w feeding|strong="H7462"\w* the \w flock|strong="H6629"\w*; neither shall the \w shepherds|strong="H7462"\w* \w feed|strong="H7462"\w* themselves any more; for I will \w deliver|strong="H5337"\w* my \w flock|strong="H6629"\w* from their \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w*, that they may not be \w meat|strong="H0402"\w* for them.

¶ For thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*; Behold, I, \add even\add* I, will both \w search|strong="H1875"\w* my \w sheep|strong="H6629"\w*, and seek them \w out|strong="H1239"\w*.

As a \w shepherd|strong="H7462"\w* seeketh \w out|strong="H1243"\w* his \w flock|strong="H5739"\w* in the \w day|strong="H3117"\w* that he is \w among|strong="H8432"\w* his \w sheep|strong="H6629"\w* \add that are\add* \w scattered|strong="H6567"\w*; so will I seek \w out|strong="H1239"\w* my \w sheep|strong="H6629"\w*, and will \w deliver|strong="H5337"\w* them out of all \w places|strong="H4725"\w* where they have been \w scattered|strong="H6327"\w* in the \w cloudy|strong="H6051"\w* and \w dark|strong="H6205"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*.\f + \fr 34.12 \ft As…: Heb. According to the seeking\f*

And I will bring them \w out|strong="H3318"\w* from the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, and \w gather|strong="H6908"\w* them from the \w countries|strong="H0776"\w*, and will \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* them to their own \w land|strong="H0127"\w*, and \w feed|strong="H7462"\w* them upon the \w mountains|strong="H2022"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* by the \w rivers|strong="H0650"\w*, and in all the inhabited \w places|strong="H4186"\w* of the \w country|strong="H0776"\w*.

I will \w feed|strong="H7462"\w* them in a \w good|strong="H2896"\w* \w pasture|strong="H4829"\w*, and upon the \w high|strong="H4791"\w* \w mountains|strong="H2022"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* shall their \w fold|strong="H5116"\w* be: there shall they \w lie|strong="H7257"\w* in a \w good|strong="H2896"\w* \w fold|strong="H5116"\w*, and \add in\add* a \w fat|strong="H8082"\w* \w pasture|strong="H4829"\w* shall they \w feed|strong="H7462"\w* upon the \w mountains|strong="H2022"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

I will \w feed|strong="H7462"\w* my \w flock|strong="H6629"\w*, and I will cause them to lie \w down|strong="H7257"\w*, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*.

I will \w seek|strong="H1245"\w* that which was \w lost|strong="H0006"\w*, and bring \w again|strong="H7725"\w* that which was driven \w away|strong="H5080"\w*, and will bind \w up|strong="H2280"\w* \add that which was\add* \w broken|strong="H7665"\w*, and will \w strengthen|strong="H2388"\w* that which was \w sick|strong="H2470"\w*: but I will \w destroy|strong="H8045"\w* the \w fat|strong="H8082"\w* and the \w strong|strong="H2389"\w*; I will \w feed|strong="H7462"\w* them with \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w*.

And \add as for\add* \w you|strong="H0859"\w*, O my \w flock|strong="H6629"\w*, thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*; Behold, I \w judge|strong="H8199"\w* between \w cattle|strong="H7716"\w* and \w cattle|strong="H7716"\w*, between the \w rams|strong="H0352"\w* and the he \w goats|strong="H6260"\w*.\f + \fr 34.17 \ft cattle: Heb. small cattle of lambs and kids\f*\f + \fr 34.17 \ft he goats: Heb. great he goats\f*

\add Seemeth it\add* a small \w thing|strong="H4592"\w* unto you to have eaten \w up|strong="H7462"\w* the \w good|strong="H2896"\w* \w pasture|strong="H4829"\w*, but ye must tread \w down|strong="H7429"\w* with your \w feet|strong="H7272"\w* the \w residue|strong="H3499"\w* of your \w pastures|strong="H4829"\w*? and to have \w drunk|strong="H8354"\w* of the \w deep|strong="H4950"\w* \w waters|strong="H4325"\w*, but ye must \w foul|strong="H7515"\w* the \w residue|strong="H3498"\w* with your \w feet|strong="H7272"\w*?

And \add as for\add* my \w flock|strong="H6629"\w*, they \w eat|strong="H7462"\w* that which ye have \w trodden|strong="H4823"\w* with your \w feet|strong="H7272"\w*; and they \w drink|strong="H8354"\w* that which ye have \w fouled|strong="H4833"\w* with your \w feet|strong="H7272"\w*.

¶ Therefore thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd* unto them; Behold, I, \add even\add* I, will \w judge|strong="H8199"\w* between the \w fat|strong="H1274"\w* \w cattle|strong="H7716"\w* and between the \w lean|strong="H7330"\w* \w cattle|strong="H7716"\w*.

Because ye have \w thrust|strong="H1920"\w* with \w side|strong="H6654"\w* and with \w shoulder|strong="H3802"\w*, and \w pushed|strong="H5055"\w* all the \w diseased|strong="H2470"\w* with your \w horns|strong="H7161"\w*, till ye have \w scattered|strong="H6327"\w* them \w abroad|strong="H2351"\w*;

Therefore will I \w save|strong="H3467"\w* my \w flock|strong="H6629"\w*, and they shall no more be a \w prey|strong="H0957"\w*; and I will \w judge|strong="H8199"\w* between \w cattle|strong="H7716"\w* and \w cattle|strong="H7716"\w*.

And I will set \w up|strong="H6965"\w* \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w shepherd|strong="H7462"\w* over them, and he shall \w feed|strong="H7462"\w* them, \add even\add* my \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w*; he shall \w feed|strong="H7462"\w* them, and he shall be their \w shepherd|strong="H7462"\w*.

And I the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* will be their \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, and my \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* a \w prince|strong="H5387"\w* \w among|strong="H8432"\w* them; I the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* have \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w* \add it\add*.

And I will \w make|strong="H3772"\w* with them a \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* of \w peace|strong="H7965"\w*, and will cause the \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* \w beasts|strong="H2416"\w* to \w cease|strong="H7673"\w* out of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w*: and they shall \w dwell|strong="H3427"\w* \w safely|strong="H0983"\w* in the \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w*, and \w sleep|strong="H3462"\w* in the \w woods|strong="H3293"\w*.

And I will \w make|strong="H5414"\w* them and the places round \w about|strong="H5439"\w* my \w hill|strong="H1389"\w* a \w blessing|strong="H1293"\w*; and I will cause the \w shower|strong="H1653"\w* to come \w down|strong="H3381"\w* in his \w season|strong="H6256"\w*; there shall be \w showers|strong="H1653"\w* of \w blessing|strong="H1293"\w*.

And the \w tree|strong="H6086"\w* of the \w field|strong="H7704"\w* shall \w yield|strong="H5414"\w* her \w fruit|strong="H6529"\w*, and the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* shall \w yield|strong="H5414"\w* her \w increase|strong="H2981"\w*, and they shall be \w safe|strong="H0983"\w* in their \w land|strong="H0127"\w*, and shall \w know|strong="H3045"\w* that I \add am\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, when I have \w broken|strong="H7665"\w* the \w bands|strong="H4133"\w* of their \w yoke|strong="H5923"\w*, and \w delivered|strong="H5337"\w* them out of the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of those that \w served|strong="H5647"\w* themselves of them.

And they shall no more be a \w prey|strong="H0957"\w* to the \w heathen|strong="H1471"\w*, neither shall the \w beast|strong="H2416"\w* of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w devour|strong="H0398"\w* them; but they shall \w dwell|strong="H3427"\w* \w safely|strong="H0983"\w*, and none shall make \add them\add* \w afraid|strong="H2729"\w*.

And I will raise \w up|strong="H6965"\w* for them a \w plant|strong="H4302"\w* of \w renown|strong="H8034"\w*, and they shall be no more \w consumed|strong="H0622"\w* with \w hunger|strong="H7458"\w* in the \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, neither \w bear|strong="H5375"\w* the \w shame|strong="H3639"\w* of the \w heathen|strong="H1471"\w* any more.\f + \fr 34.29 \ft of renown: or, for renown\f*\f + \fr 34.29 \ft consumed: Heb. taken away\f*

Thus shall they \w know|strong="H3045"\w* that I the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* their \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \add am\add* with them, and \add that\add* they, \add even\add* the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \add are\add* my \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* 
d \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*
d*.

And \w ye|strong="H0859"\w* my \w flock|strong="H6629"\w*, the \w flock|strong="H6629"\w* of my \w pasture|strong="H4830"\w*, \add are\add* \w men|strong="H0120"\w*, \add and\add* I \add am\add* your \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*.
